template.name: Ball

query.comment: Train a controller (with penalty for deaths) with position and velocity in the state space
Estimate the maximum number of actual hits under the strategy

plot.title: Probability Density Distribution
plot.comment: Parameters: α=0.05, ε=0.05, bucket width=1, bucket count=14 Runs: 100 in total, 100 (100%) displayed, 0 (0%) remaining Span of displayed sample: [31, 44] Mean estimate of displayed sample: 36.94 ± 0.48177 (95% CI)
